title: Secluded New Zealand Luxury
description: Escape to where the world can’t find you with three nights at Australasia’s Leading Experiential Luxury Property, Annandale in New Zealand. Includes daily chef-created gourmet breakfasts, nightly farm-to-table three-course dinners, complimentary Wi-Fi and discounts on activities like kayaking, clay target shooting and scenic helicopter flights.
offer_address: New Zealand, 130 Wharf Rd, Pigeon Bay 7583, New Zealand

title: Secluded Five-Star Hideaway: Gourmet Dining and Amazing Inclusions
